name: Acrolinx GmbH
overview: Acrolinx GmbH engages in the development, licensing, and implementation of content optimization software to corporations worldwide. It offers Acrolinx software that evaluates text against corporate standards for terminology, spelling, grammar, style, tone of voice, and search engine optimization. The company also provides a cloud-based version of its content optimization software to translators. Its software is used by corporations to analyze, measure, and improve the quality of technical and business content, including technical manuals, user guides, service bulletins, maintenance manuals, training courses, data sheets, white papers, marketing collaterals, and Web content. Acrolinx GmbH was founded in 2002 and is based in Berlin, Germany.
